Package
Description
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu
Shesmu: a decision action server
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.compiler
This contains the compiler that converts .shesmu files into an ActionGenerator

Tasks that can be run by olives

JSON objects for filters used when query, purging, or getting statistics on actions

Utilities to handle JSON files
